attributes.action: Make it compulsary for all riders of motorcycles to wear at least a British Standard approved armoured jacket, as well as the already compulsary helmet.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unsafe for any rider of a motorcycle to be without an armoured jacket.  As may riders, particularly under 18s, choose to instead wear their normal clothes, they should be required, by law, to wear one.
